panels.description: Average measurements grouped by ping request targets

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (destination_name) (increase(external_ping_packets_sent_total{node=~"$source_node", destination_name=~"$destination_name"}[$__range]))
  -
  sum by (destination_name) (increase(external_ping_packets_received_total{node=~"$source_node", destination_name=~"$destination_name"}[$__range]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_name) (increase(external_ping_packets_sent_total{node=~"$source_node", destination_name=~"$destination_name"}[$__range]))

( 
  sum by (destination_name) (increase(external_ping_packets_sent_total{node=~"$source_node", destination_name=~"$destination_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
  -
  sum by (destination_name) (increase(external_ping_packets_received_total{node=~"$source_node", destination_name=~"$destination_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_name) (increase(external_ping_packets_sent_total{node=~"$source_node", destination_name=~"$destination_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
